title: inru pOl
sahitya:
inru pOl irundiDa aruL purivAi inakula tilakA aDimai nAn enrenrum


anupallavi

  kanru pashuvinait-toDarvadu pOl un kannal nAmattai uraittuL arugil


caraNam    dhanam uNDu tavamuDaiyOr viRumbum dAsharathi un tAL malar enrenakkOr
 manamuNDu un manmata rUpattil mayangi mei marandu uyya vazhi kATTum
 bandhu janamuNDu bhuvi vAzhnAL ellAm paramanun pugazh pADik-koNDADi onriDavE
 annai aruLuNDu pErinba vIDaDaiya AnjanEyar arundiDum tAraka amuduNDu aDimaikku
